revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Fu Chan |model=FC-AL2014PW |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/04/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point,dsl modem |fcc_id=RENFC-AL2014PW |ic_id= |pwr_v=16 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Senao NL-2511CD EXT2 |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=conexant |default_ssid_regex=^conexant$ |default_ip=10.0.0.2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=epicrouter |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} The default credentials are from the FCC submitted manual. There also appears to be a non-administrator account (user:password).
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''conexant'''.
The FCC test report also lists and additional model of FC-AL2014P. This model may lack the wireless card.
